Posts.Content: Feb 5, 2012 07:41PM Patty252555140415 wrote: I say go, it is what it is ad you can't change it. I think it would be good for you to go rest body and mind. Sometimes being away from the same routine will make you think clearer. Just my two cents. Good luck and God Bless.
Posts.Title: What would you do? Biopsy scheduled 4 days before vacation... shabby6485 awb

Posts.Content: Aug 8, 2011 02:44PM Patty252555140415 wrote: Beanpole- I had about a two week wait before the biopsy. The worst is the waiting, for appts. ans results. I did go to a well know BS ib my area, honestly glad I waited for him. I did see an onco and after that had a second opinion. I went with the second onc. Geetting ready for tx #8. Then on to radation. You will be welcomed with open arms on these boards. The information from peoples experiences is awesone. I was the biggest baby, still am but the support of this group has made a big impact. Take care of yourself, try to keep yourself busy. All the best, Patty
